title: Santa Fe National Historic Trail: Be A Junior Ranger
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Be A Junior Ranger               Be A Junior Ranger          Are you ready to hit the trail? The Junior Ranger program will help you explore five national parks and one national historic trail! You can visit any of these parks to earn the Santa Fe National Historic Trail Junior Ranger badge: Fort Larned National Historic Site, Bent's Old Fort National Historic Site, Fort Union National Monument, Pecos National Historical Park, and Capulin Volcano National Monument. Junior Ranger Activity Book (516 KB pdf) Wagons ho! You are on your way!  Â       Parks often offer Junior Ranger camps and other ways to participate in the Junior Ranger program. Check the park's website (all five are listed above) to learn more. For families unable to travel to parks, consider participating in a virtual visit. Contact us for more information.
